version_description:
- Fixed a crash bug with the new Weather implementation
- Fixed a crash bug with VoiceOver
- Fixed multiple Youtube video feed issues
- Additional stability issues and bugs fixed

-We now have Universal app support! This one app will now support both iPhone and iPad.
-Support for variable bit rate videos to improve playback by adjusting video quality.
-Fixed an issue where the video progress bar was not updating
-Fixed err

-Fixed issue with dotted lines on toplines and highlines
-Fixed memory management issue with webviews
-Fixed issue with ads on Youtube video pages

- Fixed a crash for upcoming iOS version
- Fixed font issue for upcoming iOS version

• Brand new look
Get to stories faster with the improved navigation and design.
• Split-screen view
Reading on a tablet or a plus-sized phone? Turn it horizontally for a split-screen mode to browse headlines as you read stories.
• Person

6.0.1
• Bug fixes

6.0.0
• Brand new look
   Get to stories faster with the improved navigation and design.
• Split-screen view
   Reading on a tablet or a plus-sized phone? Turn it horizontally for a split-screen
• We’ve made a number of improvements and fixed some small bugs

• Print Edition
Get access to a replica of the newspaper from within the app

• Extended voiceover support
• Refined the UI to improve scannability
• Fixed some small bugs
• We’ve made a number of improvements and fixed some small bugs
• We’ve made a number of improvements to support iOS 11 and fixed some small bugs

• Extended support for iPhone X
• More top stories on the homepage
• Added instructions on how to personalize sections in the app on the Edit Sections page
• Added an option to restore sections to the default order on the Edit Sections page
•
• We’ve made a number of improvements and fixed some small bugs

We fixed some bugs that caused issues with using your login to sign in

We fixed some bugs that prevented embedded videos and photos from displaying in certain stories.
We fixed some bugs that cause issues with sign in.
